sentences.sentence: He had a naturally ruddy complexion, even more flushed now from dancing.
sentences.translation: 他的面色天生红润，现在跳了舞就更红了。

sentences.sentence: There was a ruddy great hole in the ceiling.
sentences.translation: 天花板上有一个要命的大洞。

sentences.sentence: I can't get the ruddy car to start!
sentences.translation: 我就是发动不了这破车！
